Local Enchant Province - Gem Duration:Blood Fecundity
Can only be cast by :#3200 Panageis
Hidden Enchantment :1
The Panageis uses sacred carcasses from a Megara Chasm to complete the cycle of death and rebirth and procure fertility in the province. The growth scale of the province is increased by two. The ritual lasts longer if more gems are used.
